definition: exceptionally good, an instance of boastful talk, to show off
details:
adjective
- exceptionally good
= synonyms: boss
noun
- an instance of boastful talk
= example: an instance of boastful talk

verb

= synonyms: gas, bluster, boast, gasconade, swash, tout, shoot a line
